title: Interpretation of a dream about white wool in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about white wool in a dream Some people want to know the interpretation of a dream about white wool in a dream, and it is one of the very disturbing dreams, so they are looking for an interpretation of this dream, but the reader must prevent him. He and they do not fully believe that because the jurisprudence of some scholars who seek to reach the truth are the ones who may make mistakes and may be wrong. Moreover, it is true that the site and its administrators have nothing to do with interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about white wool in a dream: Seeing white wool in a dream may indicate the purity and purity of the dreamer’s heart, thanks to God. If one sees white wool, this may indicate material gains that he may obtain The dreamer will see it in his life during those days, thanks to God. Dreaming of white wool in a dream may indicate that he will perform some great good deeds during this time, and God knows best. Dreaming of white wool in a dream may indicate a significant improvement in the financial condition during this period, And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about wearing wool in a dream: Wearing wool in a dream can indicate the great benefit that the dreamer can reap in his life during those days. If a person sees himself wearing wool, this may be an indication of the positive changes that occur in one’s insight during these days. Period, and God knows best. In the event that he sees himself wearing wool in a dream, this may indicate positive events that will come to the dreamer’s life in those days, thanks to God. To see yourself wearing wool in a dream may indicate the abundance of money in visions and material gains during this time, And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about eating wool in a dream: If a person sees himself eating wool in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will face some problems and difficulties in his life during that period. If you see yourself eating wool in a dream, this may indicate an inability to satisfy desires and dreams. During this period, and God knows best. If a person sees that he is eating wool, this may indicate obstacles that the dreamer may face in his life during those days, and God knows best. Seeing him eating wool in a dream may indicate the psychological disturbances that the dreamer feels in his life during those days. And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about asking for wool from a dead person in a dream: If one sees that a dead person is asking for wool, this may indicate good deeds from my point of view, and praise be to God. If one sees a deceased person asking for wool in a dream, this may indicate that he is a very supportive person to others in That time. It is possible that seeing the dead person asking for wool in a dream indicates the need for the dead person to pray and give charity for him during this period, thanks to God. If a person sees that the deceased was asking him for wool, this may indicate positive changes that occur in his life’s insight during those days. And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about burning wool in a dream: Burning wool in a dream may indicate that the dreamer has abandoned his religion and must repent and return to God, Blessed and Most High. And if a person sees wool burning, it may indicate the inability to achieve the goals and ambitions of those days, and God knows best. .F

title: Interpretation of a dream about cookies in a dream

preview.html: Many people are looking for the interpretation of seeing cookies in a dream in detail. Through our article today, we will discuss all the implications of seeing cookies in a dream. You may also be interested in knowing more about money in a dream. Seeing cookies in general is considered... A dream is one of the praiseworthy visions of nourishment, profit, and halal money that is blessed in it. Moreover, this vision indicates good news or unpleasant actions and words that the opinion performs in reality, such as a cookie is one of his favorite foods and pastries, and many children, of foods Which promises good news and joy, and God knows best. See also: A snake in a dream. Interpretation of seeing cookies in a dream in detail. Interpretation of seeing cookies in a dream in detail. See also: Backgrounds in a dream. Interpretation of seeing cookies in a dream has many different meanings, which will be recognized through The following lines: Seeing cookies in a dream is generally considered a sign of sustenance and blessing, whether that sustenance is money, children, or marriage. Dreaming of kneading and baking cookies in a dream is strong evidence that goodness, grace, and abundant money will come to the dreamer’s life in the coming days, and God knows best. A dream about cookies also indicates that the dreamer will get a promotion at work or will receive a lot of money from a halal source. Interpretation of a dream about seeing cookies in a dream indicates that the prices of goods and merchandise that we need are constantly rising, in addition to the fact that the price of The product we wish to purchase will be higher than any expectations that arose before the price change. Seeing the difficulty of obtaining cookies in a dream is an indication that someone is trying to get what you deserve and is working to reap the fruits of your efforts and work, and God knows best. Seeing cookies Being attached in a dream with great ease is an indication that the dreamer knows well what he wants, walks with steady steps and makes a clear plan to achieve everything he desires to achieve his goals. Seeing someone eating, taking or serving biscuits in a dream is an indication that the dreamer is in good health, in addition to Family stability, and God knows best. Seeing other people eating cookies in a dream is a sign that these people lack love and emotional conflict in their personal and social lives. Seeing baking cookies in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s high status and famous status among people. title: Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream for an unmarried woman, according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing a child in a dream for an unmarried woman

preview.html: In this article, we present to you the interpretation of seeing a child in a dream for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of seeing children in a dream for an unmarried woman, which is one of the most common dreams, whether they see a boy or a girl, and in general it gives joy and happiness to those around her, and it is a symbol of innocence and purity of hearts and seeing it in a dream is one of the most important happy dreams for the dreamer, especially if he sees them and they are happy. Just as children represent a source of joy in reality, see Mahmoud and we promise you success in the dream, so in the following article we show you the interpretation of seeing children in a single dream by Ibn Sirin from the Encyclopedia website, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing children in a dream for a single woman Ibn Sirin interpreted this dream in general according to the condition of the seer and the appearance of the child in the dream. Imam Ibn Sirin narrated that if an unmarried girl sees a smiling child in a dream, this vision is good for her and indicates a change in her situation for the better and the beginning of a new life for her. It may mean that he got a new job opportunity or marriage, God knows best. If a person sees in a dream an unmarried woman breastfeeding her child, this vision reflects the extent of her poor psychological state. As for seeing a male child, this vision is hateful and indicates the worries and sorrows that she feels in reality. But if a single woman sees that she sees pictures of herself as a child in a dream, this dream indicates her association with a man of good morals, God knows best. Among the interpretations of this dream is also that if she sees a child who does not remember the exact shape of the dream in the dream, this dream indicates that she will be exposed to problems in her life. Seeing a child in a dream for an unmarried woman can indicate success and excellence in reality, God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explained that seeing young children is one of the commendable visions in the dream of an unmarried girl, which will have good news if she marries soon, God willing. If the young child in the dream of an unmarried woman is male, this indicates that the man whom the unmarried woman marries will be a man of morals and religion, good morals, generosity and generosity, God willing God. Seeing a handsome child in a dream by Ibn Sirin for an unmarried woman Seeing a crying child in a dream by an unmarried woman indicates the presence of many jealous people who hate her in reality, so she should beware of them. Seeing a good little child in a dream as long as he looks beautiful in elegant clothes, but if the boy cries or looks ugly, it is an unpleasant vision that warns singles of problems and crises in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream of many children for singles Ibn Sirin told us that seeing many young children in a dream indicates the dreamer's good offspring, whether male or female. It is also a commendable vision that indicates the happiness and stability that the visionary will enjoy in her coming days. If the unmarried woman sees that the children are wearing beautiful and clean clothes, this is a good vision that indicates getting rid of crises, worries and concerns in her life. While the single woman sees many and wears dirty clothes or cries loudly, this is a hand

title: Interpretation of a dream about collecting clothes

preview.html: Dream interpretation of seeing collecting clothes in a dream, and collecting clothes means washing them after they dry. Seeing collecting clothes in a dream can be a good sign or it can be a precursor or warning of the appearance of evil. Interpreters differed in their interpretation of seeing a set of clothes whether she was single, married, pregnant or pregnant. Absolute has different meanings, and today, through the Laundry Collection website, you will discuss in detail the interpretation of the vision of collecting clothes in a dream, based on the opinion of major commentators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and Al-Nabulsi. Or Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. Interpretation of the vision of collecting clothes by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a set of laundry spread out in a dream is an announcement of the independence of the viewer, whether it is housing, marriage, or travel. Checking out our collection of clean clothes states that the dreamer will find a new job. Seeing a set of dirty laundry It indicates narrow livelihoods. I see myself doing laundry in a dream. It symbolizes the viewer’s neglect of some duties and acts of obedience. Seeing a sick person picking up clothes in a dream indicates resistance to illness. Seeing a debtor collecting laundry indicates spending money on him from which the debt is paid. Seeing a single woman doing laundry shows his ambition, research, and diligence. See the collection of clothes in color. White: It indicates the purity and peace of the dreamer’s heart. Interpretation of a vision of collecting clothes in a woman’s dream: A vision of a collection of clothes for a single woman shows that her marriage is approaching. Interpretation of a dream of collecting clothes for a married woman: Looking at a collection of clothes for a married woman shows that she brings her family together and strengthens the relationships between its members. Seeing a collection of clothes in a dream for a married woman: a lot of Good news. Interpretation of a dream about collecting clothes for a pregnant woman. Seeing a collection of clothes in a dream for a pregnant woman announces the imminent birth and ease. Interpretation of seeing a man collecting clothes in a dream. Seeing a collection of clothes in a man’s dream indicates the end of problems and fears. Checking the collection of clothes. Statement of the patient’s recovery, alleviation of all his distress, and settlement of debts. Interpretation Seeing white clothes in a dreamSeeing white clothes in a dream indicates purity and purity of the heart. Seeing white clothes in a dream symbolizes a good reputation, good morals, and love for people. Seeing white clothes in a dream announces good deeds. Seeing white clothes indicates the fulfillment of aspirations and goals and the achievement of efforts. Interpretation of a dream about washing clothes For a divorced woman, seeing him washing clothes for a divorced woman indicates the end of the problems that accompanied her divorce and separation from her husband. Seeing a divorced woman washing her children’s clothes and handing them to others indicates that her children are far away from her and her sadness over their separation. Interpretation of seeing a clothes dryer in a dream: Seeing an individual laundry rack full of clothes indicates the presence of obstacles and impediments that prevent her from getting married. Single women hanging a modest amount of laundry on the clothes rack. This indicates that he has received a lot of goodness. Seeing a married woman posting her husband’s clothes in the flyer expresses understanding and compatibility with her husband. Seeing a married woman on the grill with her children’s clothes indicates the stability of marital life and the calm of her condition. Seeing a man

title: Interpretation of seeing your beloved’s mother in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a lover’s mother in a dream: A girl who is going through an emotional state with a specific person who she is searching for and may not be sure of his seriousness and true desire to marry her, or that they are currently preparing for the official engagement ceremony or that it has become a thing of the past for her. We learn about all of these and their interpretation in our topic Today.Interpretation of seeing your lover’s mother in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing your lover’s mother in a dream? In general, this vision indicates the good that will come to the dreamer, especially if she is tired and trying hard to achieve it.Interpretation of seeing your lover’s mother in a dream portends success and distinction for the girl who is still At a certain educational stage, because she gives study its due and is not lazy in performing its duties. If she sees in her dream the smile of her lover’s mother, this means that she will officially unite with him and the satisfaction of all the parents of both parties for this marriage, which will be happy and blessed in the future (God willing). In case the dreamer is already married to another person and sees the mother of her ex-lover in her dream, there is an old memory that appears in her head again in her life, but it does not cause her any harm. Or it affects her relationship with her husband. The mutual peace between the two in the dream indicates that the dreamer’s relationship with everyone she knew in the past is very good, as she is still accepted by them despite her absence from them for long periods. But if he sees her shedding tears when he sees her, then there are obstacles standing in his way. This connection, and this person may not be serious in his relationship with the girl of his dreams and should avoid dealing with him and stay away from him. As soon as possible. If she sees her expressing her anger and tenderness when she sees her in a dream, this is a sign that she is dissatisfied with the relationship between her son and the dreamer and will be an important reason for severing this connection soon. Your dream will find its interpretation in seconds. Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site from Google. Interpretation of seeing your beloved’s mother in A dream by Ibn Sirin: A woman in general, and an unmarried girl in particular, seeks an interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of my beloved’s mother in a dream to discover the true meaning behind this dream, which Ibn Sirin mentioned in a detailed series of topics according to the difference in the mother’s body in her dream: If she kisses her with joy and welcome And a smile filled her face. It is good that the person with the vision has chosen the right person for her, whether she is single, divorced, or widowed. In the case of a married woman, her relationship with the man will be much stronger than before and he will be sure of his love for her over time. Seeing the mother of the beloved and his family in a state of happiness is evidence that her future holds a lot of good news. If she is a science student who will rise to the highest levels of science and if she finishes her studies and wants to marry this young man in particular, then it will be easy for her and the marriage will be fine. As for a married woman who finds in her dream the mother of her lover to whom she was engaged before her marriage, She tries to talk to her while he leaves her and leaves, so the dream means that she only cares about her home and her family. Her life and she does not let the past control her

title: What is the interpretation of seeing Ayat al-Kursi in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen?

preview.html: Here is the interpretation of Ayat Al-Kursi in a dream. It is one of the greatest verses in the Book of God Almighty and has its sanctity, as our honorable Messenger ordered us to continue reading it so that God Almighty protects us. Of the devils and jinn, there are many good things, but each case of reading in a dream has a meaning and its interpretation varies depending on the dreamer’s condition. In our article today, we will shed light on the most important interpretations of the dream in this verse by Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Sirin, and Al-Nabulsi in detail through the encyclopedia, so follow us. Vision Ayat al-Kursi in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that whoever sees in his dream that he memorizes Ayat al-Kursi in his sleep, this is evidence that this dreamer is gifted with intelligence, intelligence, and insight. But if a person dreams that he is reciting Ayat al-Kursi to a group of people, this is a sign that the dreamer is in good health. And that his body is free of diseases. Any chair in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin, is an indication of the excellent security and protection that the fortuneteller enjoys. But if one reads Surat Al-Baqarah in its entirety, including the verse of the Throne, this is a sign that God will provide the Prophet with extensive and useful knowledge, And his life will be long, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. As for whoever sees in his dream that he is reading part of Ayat Al-Kursi and does not complete it, this is an indication that the dreamer and his son are facing a big problem, but God will save them from it. When a man dreams that he recites Ayat al-Kursi and follows it with a portion of Surat al-Baqarah, this is evidence that the dreamer will inherit, but it is an inheritance that has many problems and rulings, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. The symbol of reading Ayat al-Kursi in a dream. The interpreter of dreams, Ibn Sirin, indicated that reading Ayat al-Kursi in a dream is one of the most promising dreams and abundant livelihood for the dreamer, and indicates a change in circumstances for the better. If the dreamer sees himself reciting Ayat al-Kursi for his family in a dream, this indicates his efforts. To protect them in reality from the evil and envy of Satan. This vision portends the dreamer overcoming crises in reality. It is good news for someone who suffers from an illness that resembles recovery in reality. The vision also expresses important aspects of the dreamer’s personality, which are his cunning and sharp intelligence in reality. The dream interpreter said Ibn Shaheen, reciting Ayat al-Kursi in a dream shows the dreamer’s love for goodness. If the dreamer sees himself reciting Ayat al-Kursi to a familiar person in a dream, this indicates the extent to which the visionary seeks to help that person overcome his judgments in reality. This vision is one of the promising visions. For the dreamer to hear what pleases him in reality. As for reading Ayat Al-Kursi in a dream, this indicates piety and uprightness. Some jurists indicated that this vision indicates the acquisition of a lot of money through inheritance, and God knows best. Ayat Al-Kursi in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. title: Interpretation of drowning in a dream and saving someone from drowning in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a single person drowning for a married woman for a pregnant woman, whether in a pool of someone who drowned in the sea and died and got out of it by drowning the boy and saving him in a pool of Ibn Sirin. Drowning in a dream is one of the most disturbing dreams, seeing someone drowning in a dream makes him afraid and anxious and feels inside that something bad will happen, but there are many interpretations of this vision. Seeing yourself drowning in a dream has psychological aspects, which means that it is not necessary for it to be a vision that portends the emergence of something or warns of something, but it can be psychological pressures or thoughts that accumulate in the dreamer's subconscious. Interpretation of drowning in a dream If you dream that you are drowning, this means that you are going through an emotional setback and it can negatively affect your family and your romantic path if you are in a relationship. If there is no connection between you, this means that you will not be in a relationship in the near future If you dream that you are drowning, this indicates the magic of enemies and it may be a loss or failure of one of the projects you are planning. Your enemies are waiting for you to have the opportunity to achieve their victory over you In fact, the symbolism of a dream about drowning in the sea can sometimes be positive. For a student, it may indicate a deepening of knowledge and experience. While for a sinner, it may indicate repentance If you dream that you are drowning in unclean water, it indicates worries, problems and a sign of loss of wealth or life. If you dream that you are helping someone drown, it means that you will help your friend reach higher ranks If you dream that you are helping a family member from drowning, it means that you will bring joy and happiness to your family In reality, the symbolism of the sea and drowning in dreams is not always bad, for a student it can indicate an increase in the depth of knowledge and experience, and for a sinner, drowning can be a sign of repentance. Drowning in the sea has a positive connotation and indicates a lot of money when the sea is clear and negative otherwise. Some interpret the dream of drowning as immersion in the world and its pleasures and committing sins. Whoever sees in a dream that he is drowning in the sea but tries to escape by waving his arms and legs and succeeds, this means that he will become rich and important in his work and in society. As for drowning and not surviving, it is evidence of the loss of wealth and lives. If you see someone drowning and try to save him, this means that you will provide assistance to a friend who will raise him to a higher position. If this person is a relative or family, this means that you will bring happiness to your family and yourself. Interpretation of drowning in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing the sea in a dream is evidence of wealth, money and influence, and seeing a person drowning in it means that the person is immersed in the pleasures and goodness of the world, and preoccupied with worldly matters. If a person comes out of this sea after drowning in his sleep, this is evidence of his repentance, the justice of his condition, and that he will take from the pleasures of the world what enriches and satisfies him, but without distracting his attention. His attention. From him, from his closeness to God. And seeing a man drowning in the sea and dying, this is a sign of the death of this man while he is busy with

title: Interpretation of seeing a woman wearing a gold ring in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a married woman wearing a gold ring in a dream. The ring is one of the jewelry that women wear to adorn themselves, and there are many women who prefer to wear this jewelry, because of its aesthetic and material value, and a gold ring has many different interpretations and associations, which vary according to the social status of the viewer and the circumstances. Surrounding him, and based on that, he will know the interpretation of a dream about wearing a gold ring in a dream for a married woman.Interpretation of seeing yourself wearing a gold ring in a dream: A golden ring in a dream contains many praiseworthy interpretations that indicate that something good will happen. Gold is one of the precious metals that has great value, and the dream of a golden ring for a married woman indicates that she lives a stable life away from all troubles and troubles, and her husband presents it to her, declaring his love for her and his interest in her, as gold in a dream expresses honesty and sincerity and has many good indications and interpretations that It appears that there are good omens and that a golden ring in a dream sometimes appears to warn of some special dangers that he may be exposed to. Seeing a woman wearing a golden ring in a dream: The golden ring in a married woman’s dream is one of the most important indicators that express her good relationship with her husband, that there are good feelings between them, and that she lives a life full of comfort and away from all problems. Interpretations of a married woman wearing a gold ring in a dream are as follows: If a woman is wearing a shiny and attractive golden ring, this indicates that she is living a stable and peaceful life in the shadow of her home, husband, and family. A married woman wearing a golden ring on her left hand indicates her desire to renew her married life. Buy A gold ring for a married woman in a dream is evidence that she has many children. In the event of death, giving the married woman a gold ring indicates that she will receive an inheritance. A husband giving a gold ring to his wife indicates his devotion to her, his great love for her, and his support for her. Finding a ring Gold among a married woman’s clothes indicates that she will find a prestigious job and make a lot of profits. Wearing a golden ring in a dream for a single woman Wearing a golden ring in a dream for a single woman has many interpretations, which could be a gift from a friend or a purchase, and all interpretations indicate that there is good Coming to this single girl, hence the explanation for wearing gold. The singles ring will be identified as follows: If an unmarried woman sees a ring in a dream that was given to her through a friend, this indicates the love between them. If he wears an iron ring in a dream, it means that he will face a lot of trouble. The ring in the dream of an unmarried woman indicates Married to prosperity and getting a lot of sustenance. When he sees someone giving her a ring, that person will marry her very soon. If you see a golden ring in a dream for a single person, it means that they are going through an emotional experience and the success of this relationship depends on the type of ring. A golden ring indicates that This girl is going to get a hello

title: Interpretation of a dream about a child falling from a high place by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a child falling from a high place can indicate many interpretations for the dreamer, and the exact meaning of the dream is determined according to its events. There are those who see the child falling from above, but he survives, and there are those who see him dying, and the person may dream of his son falling on his head or simply falling from his hands. Interpretation of a dream about a child falling from a high place. Interpretation of a dream about a child falling from above could be evidence of the arrival of some good news. For the dreamer in the coming period, and therefore he must stop worrying and rely on God Almighty. A dream about a child falling from the roof of a house may portend some positive changes in the dreamer’s life, as he may reach a state of family and financial stability. Perhaps someone who saw a child falling from above in a dream He actually suffers from anxiety and pain, and here the dream almost foretells him salvation from Almighty God and spending days of peace. Interpretation of a dream about a child falling from a high place according to Ibn Sirin. A dream about a child falling from a height according to Ibn Sirin can be interpreted as a sign of family disputes and problems that require the dreamer to Be as calm and understanding as possible. As for a dream of a child falling and escaping from harm, it symbolizes the dreamer’s transition to a new stage in his life. He may be able to get married and create a new world for himself with God’s help, or he may move to a new job or a prestigious position and other aspects of life. It changes, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a child falling from a high place for single people. Interpretation of a dream about a child falling from a height may indicate the occurrence of some positive events in the dreamer’s life. Position at work and obtaining more material gains, and this requires the dreamer to work hard and pray to God Almighty a lot. Or a dream about a child falling from the top of a house may indicate that the girl will soon marry or join a new job. And reading the Qur’an, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a child falling and dying for a single woman. A dream about a child falling from a height and dying can indicate a change in the dreamer’s private life on a case-by-case basis, for example if he suffers from many fears and problems, then the dream can That heralds comfort close to God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about a child falling from a high place for a married woman: A dream about a child falling from above for a married woman may be a sign that the dreamer will be able to achieve his goals and aspirations in this life, provided that he continues to strive, strive, and pray to God Almighty. May God Almighty seek success and success from Him. Glory be to Him, the good news that may come to the vision and reassure her heart for the coming season, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about a child falling and saving him for a married woman: A dream about a child falling from a height and not being injured may warn the dreamer that he will soon be freed from the worries and sorrows that afflict him, so that she can enjoy stable days with Her husband and children, and therefore a lot is necessary. Glory be to God. Interpretation of a dream about a child falling from a high place for a pregnant woman. A dream about a child falling from above for a pregnant woman is nothing more than a sign that the time of birth is approaching or that the child will fall.

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about hearing the call to prayer for a single woman?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about hearing the call to prayer for a single womanInterpretation of a dream about hearing the call to prayer for a single woman has a different meaning depending on the time of the call she hears, is it early morning, noon, or other times? Do you listen to it on your own time or at other times? Now, in our topic today, we detail all the sayings of dream interpretation scholars about this dream. What is the interpretation of a dream about hearing the call to prayer for a single woman? If the girl is truly dedicated to the teachings of her religion and wants to perform prayers at their appointed times, then her vision indicates that God (Glory be to Him) takes care of According to her justice, she must do so. Marrying a kind-hearted young man with whom she will live with great happiness. But if she is a cheerful girl and does not care about what God has commanded us to do, then seeing her listening to the call to prayer is an important sign for her to stop doing actions that anger God and return to the right path. Seeing an unmarried woman hearing the call to prayer in a dream while she is in a place that is not clean or suitable for prayer or performing the call to prayer, such as a bathroom, indicates her bad behavior, which puts her in miserable situations. With others and reduces the chances of her getting married over time. If she is the one singing the call, and her voice is beautiful, then this is evidence of her strong personality, which always defends the truth and faces difficult situations. Hearing the call to prayer in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin said: Whoever hears the call to prayer in his sleep Whoever has his heart attached to mosques should not delay in performing duties, but may even lead to the guidance of other people. And friends. If a young man sees this vision while he is in a state of despair or on his way to despair due to his failure to achieve a certain goal, then this is good news that the entire matter is in the hands of God Almighty and He is capable. Things will change for the better very soon. Seeing and hearing the sound of the dawn call is evidence of the approaching dawn, which in a dream means the end of problems and the removal of worries and sorrows. Among the negative indications that the dream came from Ibn Sirin’s point of view is for a person to see himself repeating the call to prayer from a room. He slept without purity or purity. This is a sign of differences between the dreamer and his partner in life. If the fortuneteller finds that the muezzin comes to his house and shouts loudly, and there is a sick person in the house, this may be evidence of the imminent death of this sick person, but there are also signs of his righteousness and piety. Seeing the same person standing Among a group in a spacious place, and he calls the call to prayer with a beautiful voice, indicating his piety and piety, and that there is someone who repents at his hands. What is the interpretation of a dream about hearing the dawn prayer for a single woman? The dawn call that a girl hears in her dream is good news for her that her wedding date is approaching, if she is busy with this moment in this matter. But if her goal is to reach a high position in study or work, then hearing the dawn prayer indicates her ability to achieve great success in study and successive promotions at work. But if the girl is currently suffering from psychological pain as a result of an accident that happened to her, then Her vision is psychological calm, all her worries will disappear and be replaced by joy and happiness. If she was in a state of confusion because someone approached her, but she did not know whether it was appropriate or otherwise.
